title: Foam
content: SRP has been providing custom converted foam gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

seo.title: Foam
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted foam gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

blocks.title: Foam gasket features
blocks.content:
• Quality raw foam materials
  • Easy to die-cut, fabricate
  • Closed cell structure
  • Compression set resistance
  • Available in various thicknesses and densities
  • Can be supplied adhesive backed

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Good impact & vibration absorption
  • Chemical resistance & mild oil resistance
  • Good acoustic & thermal insulation properties
  • Low water absorption
  • Wide operating temperature range

blocks.title: Common materials for Custom foam gaskets
blocks.content:
• Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • Norseal Silicone
  • PORON 4701-40 Polyurethane
  • PORON 4790-92 Polyurethane
  • BISCO BF-1000 Silicone Foam
  • BISCO HT-820 Silicone Foam

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Battery Pads & Cushions
  • Cushioning
  • EMI Shielding
  • Flame Barrier
  • Gap Filling
  • Gasketing & Sealing
  • LED Lighting
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control
  • Gaskets & Seals
  • Display Protection
  • Battery Pads
  • Shock Absorption
  • Vibration Control
  • Gap Filling
  • Electrical Enclosures
  • Sound Blocking and Absorption

gaskets.title: PORON Polyurethane Gaskets
gaskets.content: PORON Polyurethane for compression set resistanceWhen choosing a foam for your product design, compression set resistance is one of the most important considerations. PORON’s dense structure is made up of uniform microcells that allow it to bounce back to its original shape even after high force compression. PORON’s compression set resistance is comparable to that silicone rubber, which is why it’s a top choice for sealing and cushioning.What is Compression Force Deflection?Many materials measure the hardness or firmness by durometer. PORON materials are measured by the Compression Force Deflection (CFD), which shows how much force is needed to compress the material. The goal is to provide engineers and designers with specific data on how the material performs in their chosen application. To get started in choosing the right PORON material for your application, use the Compression Force Deflection (CFD) Curve Tool.Adhesive-backed PORONSRP is proud to be one of 60 Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation materials. Being a Preferred Converter means our customers get the best access to materials, competitive pricing, backed by technical training and expertise.SRP is also a preferred 3M converter partner. Our inventory and technical expertise will ensure the best adhesive, peel and stick backing to create your custom PORON seal.
gaskets.description: SRP has been providing custom converted PORON Polyurethane gaskets and seals to various industries for over 30 years.

gaskets.title: Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been providing custom converted Ensolite closed cell foam gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. The Ensolite product line offers a broad range of closed-cell foam products based on PVC/NBR, PVC/NBR/CR, EPDM and Neoprene for applications in the industrial and automotive markets.
gaskets.description: SRP provides EnsoLite closed cell sponge rubber gaskets, pads and seals to a variety of industries worldwide.

gaskets.title: HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
gaskets.content: HyPUR-cel Polyurethane foam materials can be fabricated into custom gasket, seals, pads and more. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.Offered in the broadest range of density and thickness, HyPUR-cel is a unique family of medium to high density engineered foams comprised of three distinct product lines to meet your application needs.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Supplier of HyPUR-cel Polyurethane. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.
